ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wonderful weekend and advice needed
ygData.msgSnippet: very nice =) by the way, that post before how i went up 3 AC when i changed from lizardscale cloak to cloak of the icebear, i was incorrect.  those are both
ygData.messageBody:
very nice =)

by the way, that post before how i went up 3 AC when i changed from
lizardscale cloak to cloak of the icebear, i was incorrect. those are both
8AC. befrore i got my HBC, i went from a white wolf-hide cloak to a cloak
of the icebear (7AC to 8AC) and got the 3AC jump. just to clarify.

Shada


> Thanks for the response. I was planning on heading to lguk
> when I hit 32 and trying to actually get in some groups down
> there. I ended up getting to following equipment with the
> proceeds from my forest loop:
>
> Cloak of the Icebear
> Tattered Mantle
> Lambent Breastplate
> EE Bag
> Runed Falchion
> +9 cha necklace
> +5 dex +7 cha ring (2)
